data.text: @marcdaalder @1CommonReader @max_tweedie The advice is don't over exert - ie exercise or stress. So a walk may be too much for someone who is had decent symptoms & has fatigue and shortness of breath, whereas may be fine for others. We just don't know who is at risk, but watch for signs of fatigue & rest, rest, rest
